attr.title: The Saloon
attr.desc: Another reverse-sheepherder game. Rolling rolls your gun; rolling reloads your gun.
attr.inst: Download the game for free at https://mmatt-ugh.itch.io/the-saloon, extract it, and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game for free at [https://mmatt-ugh.itch.io/the-saloon](https://mmatt-ugh.itch.io/the-saloon), extract it, and copy the game files to the port's `gamedata` folder.
